name: ENDLESS WAR
description:
Introduction to the game

Players need to control a tank and fight side by side with friendly forces to destroy as many enemies as possible. Tanks are divided into two attack modes, firing powerful missiles or very fast bullets. Whenever you defeat an enemy, you can also seize materials to obtain gold coins and use it as a tank modification. Destroy as many enemies as possible to unlock achievements!

featured part

At present, the game has set up a total of 3 maps, which are divided into grassland, mountain and plain. You can fight on different terrain!
The tank can be modified in five ways to improve its defense, movement speed, missile power, material acquisition, and the flexibility of the battery.
Although the game is a single player game, it will not fight alone when entering the battlefield. Enemy and friendly forces will be generated in the game scene. Friendly forces will help you fight. When friendly forces have low HP, you can also defeat friendly forces to obtain additional points!
